claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

extracted_evidence.quote: RIV4 is an una djuv anted vaccine containing 45 µg of HA/dose from each of the four strains.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote directly states that Flublok (RIV4) contains 45 micrograms (µg) of hemagglutinin (HA) per strain, supporting the first part of the claim.

extracted_evidence.quote: a quad rival ent in activated influenza vaccine (QIV; Fluarix Quad rival ent, Glaxo smith kline) given at 15 µg dose strain in adults aged 18 to 64 years 37.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote provides evidence that a standard-dose influenza vaccine (QIV) contains 15 micrograms (µg) of HA per strain, supporting the second part of the claim.
